title: Gaming PC
body:
Hey guys, I was planning on getting a new pc to play league, bc my old one is at 3 fps. I was thinking about getting this one, is it good? 
https://www.walmart.com/ip/Dell-Optiplex-755-Small-Form-Factor-Core-2-Duo-Dual-Core-3-00Ghz-8Gb-500Gb-Dvd-Windows-10-Home-64-Bit-Wifi-19-Lcd/149119932?wmlspartner=wlpa&selectedSellerId=3724&adid=22222222227067430760&wmlspartner=wmtlabs&wl0=&wl1=g&wl2=c&wl3=172633339150&wl4=pla-51499112287&wl5=9031561&wl6=&wl7=&wl8=&wl9=pla&wl10=113499933&wl11=online&wl12=149119932&wl13=&veh=sem#read-more
I don't want to spend a lot of money, but I would like a good gaming pc. Should I get this or look for another one. Maybe $200-$400?

replies.body: If you want a "good" gaming pc just to run league without having problems 400 is probably fine. If you want a good gaming pc for all kind of games you should atleast spent 900-1100

to be honest, without going to a good tech buddy like i did :D (because... well... im not good with thermal paste... they say less is more, but i think more is less...)
you theoretically could build a pc (seriously) that could handle leagues specs (and potentially a LOT more... *DO NOT LOOK TO PLAY ARK...* ) at anywhere from $500 to $750, 
Check out PC Part Picker and build it yourself :) - choose a motherboard, THEN a compatible CPU (and third most important is compatible RAM) those are the 3 most important to make sure they are compatible with one another (because then your spending 50-100 dollars on shit that wont work with your build) beyond that find a 500w psu, and HDD, and since im assuming you already have the mouse//keyboard your pretty much set... get 2 or 3 fans, done...

Hmmmm that review down towards the bottom of that page makes me a little worried, not to mention that typically you get what you pay for when it comes to gaming pc's. Your best bet is to check out the [**minimum specs page**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654), and make sure the system you're looking to buy has those minimums in order to play League.
